# Tiered Cache Manager Dependencies

# Core caching libraries

redis[asyncio]>=4.5.0

# Optional serialization (for performance)
msgpack>=1.0.0

# Type checking
mypy>=1.0.0

# Logging and monitoring
structlog>=22.0.0
